name: ZIZ
description:
ZIZ is a Sci-Fi-Adventure game featuring space traveller Motoko and android Seven.
Story:

As Motoko awakes from Cryosleep research vessel ZIZ is unmanned. Together with Seven she has to find out what has happened on ZIZ.
Features:

Switch-character-mechanic that helps solving puzzles  
2 minigames  
2 different endings
